title: Looking for an easily legible script that looks like a young girl's handwriting
content:
I’m hoping someone can help:

1. Identity of this typeface?  
2. Any similar ones? (need a script that’s easily legible and that looks like a young girl’s handwriting)

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture2_6348.jpg)

 [‹ Rip Slyme Hot Chocolate swashy fat modern serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30323 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Gravis logo - custom designed {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30275 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nick

comments.content:
How young?

[P22 Toy Box](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=PY.114324.0.1)  
 [FF Child’s Play](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.7090.0.0)  
 [MVB DinkScratch](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=MVB.102379.0.0)

Older: [FF Providence Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.7627.0.0)

If you want young looking connected scripts, there is [MeMimas](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231939/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=TO.10008.0.0) from Typ-O-Tones.

You can probably also find many just by searching for ’handwriting’, including many freeware sites, such as Dafont.

- Mike Yanega
